resources.string: Typical road map. Roads, some man-made features, and important natural features such as rivers are shown. Road and feature labels are also visible.
Satellite photograph data with road maps added. Road and feature labels are also visible.
Satellite photograph data. Road and feature labels are not visible
Topographic data. The map includes colors, contour lines and labels, and perspective shading. Some roads and labels are also visible.
From your current position set the radius of how far you want to get the list of restaurants, banks, universities etc.
Hi, i\'m studying CSE in United International University, living in Dhaka, Bangladesh.
